name: Spazzmania
overview:
Spazzmania is an iPad app discovery engine that finds games you wanna play on the App Store. Spazzmania combines the gaming research, video reviews and social networking elements all in one place.

You know longer have to waste time researching a game by going to youtube, then reading reviews, and then seeing what your friends are playing in various outlets. The Spazzmania app does all the leg work for you by consolidating all this information into one central location. Now, all you need to do is decide what games you want to play without the hassle of jumping around to research them.

Our recommendation engine is developed by gamers, with gamers in mind! The Spazzmania game rating system is tailored for gamers. We rate games based on what gamers really wants to know such as Control, Sound, Graphics, Fun and Value.

We give you the ability to track games you own, wanna play and have conquered. Plus, you can also see what your friends are playing too.

Spazzmania is based in Los Angeles and was founded in 2011. www.spazzmania.com
